file_content.text: You kill separatists real good, big shot. Thanks again.
Glad you made it back in one piece! Me and my squad owe you one.
Thanks to you we're cutting through the separatist interference. Be reporting back to base in no time.
Here--a little something from our private stock. Watch your hide out there, hero.
Long-range frequencies are still scrambled. We need those separatist jammers out of commission.
Stand by a tick... HQ! This is forward recon, do you copy? HQ? Blast! Thought I had 'em.
Sorry, soldier. Having a little trouble here. Actually, we could use that big gun of yours right now, if you'd help us out.
More of a cannon than a gun, really.
It is pretty big, isn't it?
When you're done admiring yourself, maybe you could hunker down and listen up.
My gun's pretty big.
What about me?
Wasn't trying to ignore you, citizen. We could use your help, too.
You look like you know your way around a blaster. Wanna be a hero?
Maybe, if I knew more.
Guns. And someone who knows how to use 'em.
I'm pretty handy with a blaster myself, you know.
What about me?
Absolutely, soldier. We need all the help we can get.
What's a hero make these days?
Depends on the pay.
More than me, citizen. If that sounds fair, then listen up.
Can I kill stuff?
That's affirmative. There'll be plenty of people who want you dead.
A crack separatist militia has taken over this village, so we're not talking dumb grunts and farmers.
They've got experts in there with serious jamming equipment.
Any ideas how to solve that problem?
What do we do?
I figure I've got one option left: Ask you for help.
So?
I suggest you start yelling really loud.
Improvise, then.
Look, I got a job that needs doing, and I need help doing it.
My mission is to deliver recon on this village, but I can't report anything through this interference!
I need those separatist jammers neutralized--so if you're headed into the village anyway, maybe you can handle it for us.
Sure.
That's what I like to hear.
You're soldiers, aren't you? Why aren't you equipped for this?
Can't you do it?
We're armed for recon, not heavy combat. Wouldn't stand a chance in that village. It's you or nobody.
We'll see if I get around to it.
No promises.
Not the answer I was looking for, but I'll take it.
If you waste those separatist jammers, report back here. I'll see if I can't requisition some equipment you could use.
We just do recon. If you need help, try the infantry.
I can't report in like this. Wesner! See if you can boost the power.
